1.title: Carriers & Cloud

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: An in depth look at what challenges the Telecoms Carriers face when entering the Cloud Market.

1.title: Are Cloud Service Providers doing enough for SMBs?

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Compare the Cloud are peeling the layers back on the Cloud Industry. Answering the questions on the lips of both providers and customers - hosts Jez Back and Andrew McLean will cover the latest trends and best interviews in this space.

2.title: IT Debt in The Cloud

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: We ask the question of IT debt in the cloud. Joining Jez and David are guests Matt Lovell, COO at Centiq and Matt Watts, Director, Technology and Strategy at NetApp.

3.title: Future of Cloud Service Providers

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Hosts Jez Back and David Organ cover the latest trends and best interviews in this space with guests - Jason Taylor, Think IT and Mark Mulvany, EMEA Hybrid Cloud Lead at Dell EMC.

4.title: Cloud & Ecosystems

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Decision makers are now being challenged to create digital and technology ecosystems. Jez Back and David Organ are joined by Carolyn Mumby, CEO of Eledecks and Nathan Lowis from DataDog to take a deeper look.

5.title: Future of IT Organisations

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The future of IT organisations has always been a hot topic, host Jez Back, is joined by David Newbould from TechData and Simon Ratcliffe from Ensono to explore this further. Look out for the special guest appearance from Ernesto as well.

8.title: The Cloud Show Series 1 Review

episode of.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Hosts Jez Back and David Organ look back at the best clips from #TheCloudShow series one.

imdb.plot outline: The Cloud Show is talk-show that is streamed on the Disruptive Live channel on the internet. A talk-show that delves into the world of cloud and brings on guests to explore a specific area. The show normally has a news segment specific to technology and then a round table discussion on key subjects. Occasionally, The Cloud Show runs specials that cover large technology events.
imdb.title: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live
akas: The Cloud Show: Disruptive Live (United Kingdom)
plot: The Cloud Show is talk-show that is streamed on the Disruptive Live channel on the internet. A talk-show that delves into the world of cloud and brings on guests to explore a specific area. The show normally has a news segment specific to technology and then a round table discussion on key subjects. Occasionally, The Cloud Show runs specials that cover large technology events.::Jez Back
